# Shop Window - Retail CRE Intelligence Platform
# SEO and Web Crawler Instructions

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Allow all major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private areas (future-proofing)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /_redirects
Disallow: /.env

# Sitemap location (future implementation)
# Sitemap: https://shopwindow.com/sitemap.xml
